WorkItem.Description: In game physical damage reduction displayed as 74.86%, Rawr displays 72.43478%, despite having checked and rechecked that all items and enchants match.  This is ultimately a rather large variance.  Checking the displayed armor value in-game, it displays 31430, Rawr displays 31428, though the discrepancy there does not account for that of the mitigation value.

Comments.Message:
Armor may be off by 2 due to Agility being off by 1 (rounding difference; WoW rounds in funny ways, and Rawr occasionally gets the rounding wrong).

The physical damage reduction is different because Rawr calculates for combat against bosses, level 73s, where the armor cap is significantly higher.
